full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHA' LDING NAG PO BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO GTOR MA 'BUL DANG, ,'PHRIN 'CHOL BSKUL BZLOG DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI GU GE MI TSAN GYI GRV'A RIGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ,^ SH'AKYA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO ,DGE LEGS SO, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
